channel.title: Rune Soul LF Coders/GFX, Web Designers and more! [WEBSITE & SERVER UP]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fcNSo.png[/img] [/center]
[b]Rune Soul[/b] is a newly formed Rune Scape server that is looking for motivated staff to join. I have already set up a groundwork website, the server has a VPS running currently and of course the website. I need more staff to help join the community so we can begin going public and working towards becoming a great Rune Scape server.
Some Features (Note: the server was just recently published so features are limited at the moment but it will continue to grow): Donator Zone Staff Zone Leveling Area Starting zone has vendors and a donator chest. Minigames
Pictures: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PoUb2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WB2RC.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6AhPB.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Swimf.jpg[/img]
Goals
- Getting an amazing community - Getting friendly staff - 600+ things on a 317 cache - Creating a greatly unique Rune Scape server - A stable server - The largest community possible
Applications:
- Beta Tester [0/7] - Hoster [0/1] - Programmer [0/2] - Client Coder [0/1] - Gfx Artist [0/1] - Website Coder [0/1] - Moderator [0/3] - Video Specialist [0/0]
Application Forms:
Programmer: Applying for: Programmer Something about yourself: Name: Ingame Name: Age: Experience(Years,Months): What motivates you to be this position?: Email or IM name(optional):
Client Coder: Applying for: Client developer Something about yourself: Name: Ingame name: Age: Past work: Experience(Year,Months): What motivates you to be this position?: Email or IM name(optional):
Web Developer: Applying for: Web Developer Something about yourself: Name: Ingame Name: Age: What code do you work with(PhP,vBulletin,etc): Past Websites/Work: Experience(Years,Months): What motivates you to be this position?: Email or IM name(optional):
GFX Designer: Applying for: GFX'ER Something about yourself: Name: Ingame Name: Age: Past Work: Experience(Years,Months): What motivates you to be this position?: Email or IM name(optional):
Ingame Administrator: Name: Age: Experience: Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?: Will you do your work and not slack of/not do your job?: Why do you think you'd benefit Rune Soul?: What motivates you to be this position?: Email or IM name(optional):
Video Specialist Name: Age: Msn: Proof of Work: Experience: Email or IM name(optional):
Beta Tester and Hoster:
Just reply to this, or email me at admin@runesoul.com. We currently have a VPS but if anyone has anything bigger than I would be glad to use it instead.

item.title: Rune Soul LF Coders/GFX, Web Designers and more! [WEBSITE & SERVER UP]
item.dc:creator: @mintzero4 mintzero4
item.description:
@mintzero4 wrote:

Ingame Administrator:
Name: Hayden
Age: 16
Experience: 2+ years
Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?: Yes i have no intention to abuse powers because it would ruin your server and make people mad
Will you do your work and not slack of/not do your job?: Yes i get on about 5-10hours and i will not slack i will keep up and make sure the server stays awesome
Why do you think you’d benefit Rune Soul?: I have worked for servers like this i know how they turn out and i know that you need good staff and im able to fit that
What motivates you to be this position?: The graphics and the users that will play and the good staff that you pick
Email or IM name(optional): Mintzerohp@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Soul LF Coders/GFX, Web Designers and more! [WEBSITE & SERVER UP]
item.dc:creator: @runesoul runesoul
item.description:
@runesoul wrote:

It has not been changed that much we have fixed some bugs and are continuing too. We are going to move the start location around but obviously I posted this to get some more coders to join the team. Since when we started a lot of the coders had to go on vacations and what not since its summer.

Still looking for coders, and web designers post only if you plan on actually being active I don’t want someone doing things for a day and that’s it.

Read full topic

Age: 15
What code do you work with(PhP,vBulletin,etc): All but im not that great with VBulletin
Past Websites/Work: Www.formationx.org (But its down now due owner have school and no time to update server)

What motivates you to be this position?: I will do my best, I love to start new projects and here is a new one So I hope you choise me.

[quote=“AriaScape, post:37, topic:405551”]Web developer & Hoster Application:

I’d like to develop your website and host the server if possible. Details:

Name: Sam (Aria)
Age: 18
Web Experience: 5+ Years (Have qualifications in web development)
Hardware/Server Experience (2+ years, MCITP, MCTS Microsoft certified technology specialist & technician)

I’d like to install a replica of the RS website, with working forums, messaging center etc…

Also the server I can offer has the following specs:

[ul][li]24/7 Windows 2003[/li]
[li]3GB RAM[/li]
[li]2GHz Processor[/li]
[li]50GB Storage[/li]
[li]300GB Monthly Bandwidth[/li][/ul][/quote]

Please take a look at my reply email I look forward to speaking to you more.
